ARKANSAS EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION COMMISSION
lOlO West Third Street
LITTLE ROCK, ARKANSAS
July 26, 1963
Hr. Marion Corwell
Media Specialist
Office of School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Mr. Corwells
If there are any planned meetings for the NAEB Public Relations
Committee, please advise me so I can make arrangements to attend.
If there is anything I can do, please let me know.
Very truly yours
T. E. Ty!
Chairman
